Emerging growth company&#160;&#160; &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section&#160;13(a) of the Exchange Act.&#160;&#160;&#9744; &#160; &#160; &#160; TABLE OF CONTENTS &#160; ITEM&#160;8.01.&#8195;&#8194;OTHER EVENTS. &#160;&#160; &#160; 3 &#160; ITEM&#160;9.01.&#8195;&#8194;FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND EXHIBITS. &#160;&#160; &#160; 4 &#160; SIGNATURES &#160;&#160; &#160; 5 &#160; EXHIBIT 1.1 &#160;&#160; EXHIBIT 4.1 &#160;&#160; EXHIBIT 4.2 &#160;&#160; EXHIBIT 4.3 &#160;&#160; EXHIBIT 4.4 &#160;&#160; EXHIBIT 4.5 &#160;&#160; EXHIBIT 4.6 &#160;&#160; EXHIBIT 5.1 &#160;&#160; EXHIBIT 23.1 &#160;&#160; &#160; ITEM&#160;8.01. OTHER EVENTS. On December&#160;1, 2022, Amazon.com, Inc. (the &#8220;Company&#8221;) closed the sale of $1,250,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 4.700% notes due 2024 (the &#8220;2024 Notes&#8221;), $1,250,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 4.600% notes due 2025 (the &#8220;2025 Notes&#8221;), $2,000,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 4.550% notes due 2027 (the &#8220;2027 Notes&#8221;), $1,500,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 4.650% notes due 2029 (the &#8220;2029 Notes&#8221;), and $2,250,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 4.700% notes due 2032 (the &#8220;2032 Notes&#8221; and, together with the 2024 Notes, 2025 Notes, 2027 Notes, and 2029 Notes, the &#8220;Notes&#8221;) pursuant to an Underwriting Agreement dated November&#160;29, 2022 (the &#8220;Underwriting Agreement&#8221;) among the Company and J.P. Morgan Securities LLC, Barclays Capital Inc., BofA Securities, Inc., and SG Americas Securities, LLC, as managers of the several underwriters named in Schedule II therein. The sale of the Notes was registered under the Company&#8217;s registration statement on Form S-3 filed on June&#160;1, 2020 (File No.&#160;333-238831). The aggregate public offering price of the Notes was $8.246&#160;billion and the estimated net proceeds from the offering were approximately $8.235&#160;billion, after deducting underwriting discounts from the public offering price and before deducting offering expenses payable by us. The Notes were issued pursuant to an Indenture dated as of November&#160;29, 2012 between the Company and Wells Fargo Bank, National Association, as trustee (the &#8220;Prior Trustee&#8221;), as amended and supplemented by Supplemental Indenture No.&#160;1, dated as of April&#160;13, 2022, among the Company, the Prior Trustee, and Computershare Trust Company, National Association, as successor trustee, together with the officers&#8217; certificate dated as of December&#160;1, 2022 issued pursuant thereto establishing the terms of each series of the Notes (the &#8220;Officers&#8217; Certificate&#8221;). The foregoing descriptions of the Underwriting Agreement and the Officers&#8217; Certificate are qualified in their entirety by the terms of such documents, which are filed as Exhibit 1.1 and Exhibit 4.1, respectively, and incorporated herein by reference. The foregoing description of the Notes is qualified in its entirety by reference to the full text of the form of 2024 Note, form of 2025 Note, form of 2027 Note, form of 2029 Note, and form of 2032 Note, which are filed hereto as Exhibit 4.2, Exhibit 4.3, Exhibit 4.4, Exhibit 4.5, and Exhibit 4.6, respectively, and incorporated herein by reference. &#160; 3 ITEM&#160;9.01. FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND EXHIBITS.
